DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the efficacy of a mobile application named ProFibro to promote self-care, and improve symptoms and health-related quality of life in Brazilian patients with fibromyalgia.
DOC.brief_title: Development of a Mobile Application to Promote Self-care in Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of fibromyalgia, according to the 2010 American College of Rheumatology diagnostic criteria smartphone user complete primary education being in physical therapy treatment for fibromyalgia or having been treated in the last 3 months diagnosis of other chronic pain conditions (neuropathies, rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, spinal stenosis or cancer) severe mental disorders (schizophrenia, psychosis, bipolar affective disorder, severe depression) moderate or severe intellectual disability hearing or visual impairment
